Title: Illuminated Incipit Page with Titlepiece
Medium: ink and pigments on European laid paper
Description: This illuminated page from Walters manuscript W.580 begins with al-sifr al-thalith min Kitab al-Shifa, written in a large Maghribi script in gold ink, indicating that it is the 3rd volume of Kitab al-Shifa by 'Iyad al-Yashubi. The inscription above the main framed area states that it is the 3rd volume of the book of al-Shifa in the hadith.
Keywords: Prayer; Arabic; Islamic; Book; Codex; Illumination; Manuscript; Contemporary Binding; Maghreb
Provenance: Henry Walters, Baltimore [date and mode of acquisition unknown]; Walters Art Museum, 1931, by bequest.
Creator: Abu al-Fadl 'Iyad ibn Mus√° al-Yahsubi al-Bahili (died 544 AH/AD 1149)
